Html:
Hi Radioman and all,

Firstly, wow amazing project i've been with it for a few years now but yet to contribute due to everything being pretty much there for me!

Ok so here's the thing I know we currently have the ability to avoid highways in the route but most mapping tools/sites allow the option to

avoid tolls, can this be added or are there any plans for this to be added?

 

Best Regards

 

 

Steveo555

google support this, http://code.google.com/intl/lt-LT/apis/maps/documentation/directions/#RequestParameters

i'll add it some day
